charities.name: Global Food Initiative
charities.description: Providing nutritious meals to hungry children in developing nations
charities.longDescription: Global Food Initiative works in over 50 countries to combat child malnutrition and food insecurity. We partner with local communities to create sustainable food systems and educational programs.
charities.impact: Feeds a child for one day

charities.name: Clean Water Foundation
charities.description: Building wells and water stations in remote communities
charities.longDescription: Clean Water Foundation installs sustainable water infrastructure in areas that lack access to clean drinking water. We've served 2+ million people across Africa and Asia.

charities.name: Education for All
charities.description: Opening schools and supporting teachers in underserved areas
charities.longDescription: Education for All believes every child deserves access to quality education. We build schools, train teachers, and provide scholarships to talented children worldwide.
charities.impact: Educates a child for one month

charities.name: Medical Relief International
charities.description: Delivering healthcare and medicines to communities in need
charities.longDescription: Medical Relief International operates mobile clinics, trains local health workers, and provides essential medicines to underserved regions. We've treated 5+ million patients.

charities.name: Environmental Conservation
charities.description: Protecting forests, wildlife, and ecosystems for future generations
charities.longDescription: Environmental Conservation works to protect the world's most critical ecosystems. We plant trees, protect endangered species, and combat climate change through community engagement.

charities.name: Youth Empowerment Program
charities.description: Training youth with skills to transform their communities
charities.longDescription: Youth Empowerment Program provides vocational training, mentorship, and employment support to young people. We focus on creating opportunities and breaking cycles of poverty.
charities.impact: Trains one youth for a better future
